scripts.lint:css-size: for f in $(find src/app/styles -mindepth 2 -name '_*.css'); do n=$(wc -l < $f); if [ $n -gt 400 ]; then echo "TOO LARGE ($n lines): $f"; exit 1; fi; done && echo "css-size: OK"
scripts.lint:component-size: for f in $(find src/components -name '*.tsx'); do n=$(wc -l < $f); if [ $n -gt 400 ]; then echo "TOO LARGE ($n lines): $f"; exit 1; fi; done && echo "component-size: OK"
